name: fluentflow

scripts.coverage: node node_modules/jscoverage/bin/jscoverage core && GPXPARSE_COV=1 node node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit --reporter=lcov
scripts.coveralls: node node_modules/jscoverage/bin/jscoverage core && GPXPARSE_COV=1 node node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit --reporter=lcov | node node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

description: FluentFlow is matching engine which lets you easily define 'followed by'-relations in a flow of json objects. Rules can be written in javascript as plain functions or using a fluent API.
author: T-moe <timolang@gmail.com>
